section.title: Mailing List directions
section.p: General information about the jakarta mailing lists can be found here. Please read these guidelines before subscribing or posting to the lists.

To subscribe to the user list, send an empty message to
cactus-user-subscribe@jakarta.apache.org.

Once you're subscribed, send mail to
cactus-user@jakarta.apache.org to post messages on the user list.

All mail sent to cactus-user@jakarta.apache.org is archived
here.
section.note: The same applies for the dev mailing list; replace "user" by "dev".
